caption: Great for buying magnificent old books with an idyllic setting :)
Super nice seller and very nice selection of books

A great place in Paris where you get great deals! Philippe is passionate and takes the time to advise, discussions with him are very pleasant. We really find all types of books, for us it was Asian literature, history and great classics. We will come back!

Philippe is a charming man. He came to my house to conscientiously choose the books that interested him, mainly French and foreign literature. I wish him to continue for a long time in this wonderful profession of bookseller, a monument in its own right of Paris.
Excellent bookseller! I highly recommend üôÇ ‚Ä¶

A very pleasant meeting with an enthusiast! And not just books but also cinema. And what cinema... The best, naturally. As for books, everything is there. The finest of arts and letters, and always in impeccable condition. That's what counts in a bookseller. Be careful, you will be dealing with a chatterbox. And that's a compliment! At a time when no one talks to their neighbor anymore, take advantage of it!

Very friendly bookseller with a large selection of books in beautiful collections (Quarto Gallimard, Collection Banche, etc.) and at very reasonable prices (unlike many other bookstores). I highly and warmly recommend.

I called on this bookstore when my family and I had to empty an apartment full of books. Unfortunately my family just wanted to throw them away, not finding anyone interested. Thanks to a friend I contacted Mr Legendre, who was immediately available and who was able to give a second life to all these books. We gave it to him with pleasure, if only so that this tradition of the quays continues... A big thank you to him, because knowing that these works did not end up in the dumpster makes me very happy.

A true book lover! Cultivated, funny, friendly, his reconversion (former business executive) is a success, at least for Parisians, and foreign travelers, who have the good idea to stop in front of his colorful boxes to "have a chat" and buy him a few carefully chosen books.

Having left to find B Bettelheim and his Psychoanalysis of Fairy Tales, which unfortunately escaped me, I looked at Plato and Socrates.... A great job as a bookseller, which we have every interest in supporting, thank you to Philippe for this wonderful meeting, for his attentiveness, and the time he devotes to his customers. Last advice, always carry cash with you when you pass by these boxes, there is bound to be something that will attract you. See you soon
Excellent choice of books! Very warm welcome from Philippe Legendre. Thank you for the conversation about Pierre Gripari whose books are rare.
A real pleasure to wander around, rummage through your boxes and unearth little treasures. And a real enrichment to share with Philippe! A big thank you for these moments of exchange
I highly recommend this site. I used its owner to get rid of many books. He was efficient, available and friendly. Having searched a lot, believe me, it's rather rare.
I recommend buying books, classics but also discoveries, in an ecological way since second-hand, under the wise and passionate advice of Philippe!
A nice discovery/encounter. A friendly person, a professional who knows his area, a well-presented stall, a pleasant setting
Very good experience at this bookstore. Quality of advice and books offered. I found my happiness there!
Excellent bookseller, available and competent, with a wide choice of books. Accepts credit card payments, which is a big advantage!
Great advice that's off the beaten path! - precise and attentive literary and philosophical detours. I highly recommend going there!
In addition to the service and his kindness, Philippe presented me with great projects, a great second life for my books! I'm delighted!
As a student, I was delighted to find books related to my studies, at an affordable price. Today, I picked up books by Kant and Hegel, I will come back!!
It was a real pleasure to meet you and all your friends from the docks... too sad not to see you again soon üò•üò• ‚Ä¶
Very nice collection in human sciences and literature. Philippe is very welcoming and gives good advice!
Great children's books, in perfect condition. Thank you Philippe üòÅüëèüèΩ ‚Ä¶
Super nice, good advice and all the books are individually packaged so in good condition!
Charming visit to Philippe. Beautiful editions of excellent quality.
An authentic bookseller who loves books. It offers a wide choice.
Always excellent advice, and very pleasant exchanges. I highly recommend.
Very friendly person. Good advice. Very fair prices. I warmly recommend.

Very warm welcome, good books and lots of advice from M.Legendre, a bookseller on Quai de la M√©gisserie. It's always a pleasure to wander around and look at these second-hand books from Paris second-hand booksellers.  We will come back with our children!
A beautiful collection and Philippe is adorable
Exceptional and inexpensive books!
Great bookstore with a wide choice of authors
The best bookseller on the quays!
Very nice bookseller and very cute place
I recommend Philippe
